partialExecutionPaths

final java.util.Stack<java.util.Set<de.uka.ilkd.key.java.SourceElement>> partialExecutionPaths
Stack to hold partial execution paths, i.e. a list of program nodes leading up to a branching statement in the code (as these may be part of several different execution paths depending on the outcome of the branching statement in question).

pathConditionMappings

java.util.Map<de.uka.ilkd.key.java.SourceElement,java.util.List<de.uka.ilkd.key.symbolic_execution.model.IExecutionBranchCondition>> pathConditionMappings
For a given path, this map stores a mapping between a PathBranchNode and a set of PathBranchCondition instances which are being taken from the PathBranchNode by this particular path.

returningFromBranch

boolean returningFromBranch
Flag indicating if we are currently returning from walking a subtree of a branching node.
